commitAddToken(address,uint256,uint256).details: Commit add token to the balancer pool.

params.balance: balance of the Token to add to the pool

exitPool(uint256,uint256[]).details: Exits the pool by redeeming the tokens.

params.minAmountsOut: Minimum amount of asset tokens to receive
params.poolAmountIn: Amount of pool tokens to redeem

params._avatar: The address of the Avatar controlling this proxy.
params._crpool: The address of the balancer Configurable Rights Pool.

params.maxAmountsIn: Max amount of asset tokens to spend
params.poolAmountOut: Number of pool tokens to receive

params.publicSwap: Sets publicSwap that allows to use balancer pool for swapping.
